name: WorldTriviaQuestions
0:
”Alexa, open world trivia questions”
”Alexa, start world trivia questions”
”Alexa, launch world trivia questions”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: world trivia questions
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Users are asked general questions and must answer with a "yes" or "no."
The categories of questions are as follows:

- geography
- history
- culture
- science 
- sports

 Each time the user guesses the answer, they earn one point. Every ten questions the user's point will be announced.

The multiplayer mode supports up to two players.
In the multiplayer mode each 20 questions will reveal the players' scores.

Try the multiplayer mode to challenge friends and family! 

Find out who will be the winner of this great Trivia World Game.

Have fun!
